Hold Fast Coaching Initiates Mandatory Navigation Training

After this weekends navigational mishap at the Rasputitsa Gravel Grinder in East Burke, VT, Hold Fast Coaching has announced that they will be adding bike race navigation as an option for all clients. This instruction will include advanced topics in navigation such as "How to identify a green arrow" and "Keeping your head up".

Apr 21, 2018
